title: Wife found impaled with 4-pronged corn rake. Hubby says accident.
itunes:title: Wife found impaled with 4-pronged corn rake. Hubby says accident.
description:
When Amy Mullis died, her hog farmer husband said it was an accident. Police say Todd Mullis killed his wife with a four pronged corn rake. With Nancy Grace today to get to the truth: Ashley Wilcott,  Judge and trial attorney; James Shelnutt, 27 years Atlanta Metro Major Case detective, SWAT Officer, retired; Caryn Stark, Psychologist; Dr Kendall Von Crowns , Travis County Texas Medical Examiner; and reporter Levi Page.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
